events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order, and I would like to request a refund immediately.
The case is categorized as a Refund request due to the customer's mention of refund and wrong item received.
Customer support agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the details of the item you received versus what you ordered?
My order number is 123456789. I ordered a Bluetooth speaker, but I received a set of headphones instead.
We apologize for the mistake. We can process a full refund for your order, or send you the correct item immediately. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to get the refund, please. Thank you for resolving this quickly.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Since your refund has been confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent a short customer satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
